home_main.desc: An NFT War Game Designed Around Gamefi Protocol

home_overview.desc_1: Kindom X is a strategy war game on blockchain. Anyone can earn tokens from the game.
home_overview.desc_2: Players can battle, collect, raise and build their kingdom in the game. All the ecosystem is designed around gamefi protocol.

home_nft.desc_1: NFT sales are using a pricing algorithm protocol.
home_nft.desc_2: Players can participate in PVP battles after getting an NFT.
home_nft.desc_3: During the battle, if you lose, there is a chance that your NFT will be burned.
home_nft.desc_4: The protocol will buy back your burned NFT.
home_nft.desc_5: The repurchase value is determined by the protocol.

home_eco.desc_2: It is the core token of KingdomX is used to value capture and game governance
home_eco.desc_4: It is the function token in game, which is used to reward players and consumption in game

home_protocol.name: KingsLanding protocol is for generating and burning NFTs
home_protocol.desc_2: While generating NFT, this protocol will get a certain amount of token as insurance.
home_protocol.desc_3: While burning NFT, this protocol will return a certain amount of token to the player.
home_protocol.desc_4: The specific amount will be calculated based on the algorithm of the protocol.
